entities.name: snitch
entities.description: The golden ball with silver wings left by Dumbledore as a reminder of perseverance and skill.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character who received the Snitch from Dumbledore.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: The former headmaster of Hogwarts who left the Snitch for Harry as a reminder.

entities.name: scrimgeour
entities.description: The Ministry official questioning Harry about the Snitch.

entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school where Dumbledore was headmaster and where Harry received the Snitch.

entities.name: hermione granger
entities.description: Harry's friend who laughed derisively at Scrimgeour's question.

relationships.description: Dumbledore left the Snitch for Harry as a reminder of perseverance and skill.
Scrimgeour questioned Harry about the reasons behind Dumbledore leaving him the Snitch.
